revised_title: An Analysis of Post-Mortem Examinations of Human Body and Internal Organs in the Sane and Insane
tldr: The author presents a comprehensive study of 2614 post-mortem examinations of the human body and internal organs in both sane and insane individuals of various ages and sexes. The study aims to establish a standard for the weight of human organs from infancy to old age and provides insights into the assigned causes of death and their impact on organ weights.
